definitions.definition: The beats not normally accented in a measure .
examples: The congregation clapped along on the offbeat .

definitions.definition: An unconventional person, someone who does not follow the beat, who chooses not to conform .

main_definition: ( music ) The beats not normally accented in a measure .
secondary_definitions: ( slang ) An unconventional person, someone who does not follow the beat, who chooses not to conform .
